text: Lobelia aberdarica is a species of plant in the family Campanulaceae. It is restricted to the uplands of Kenya and Uganda (1860-3350m). Its natural habitats are lower and upper montane and subalpine swamps and meadows. It has been brought into cultivation. ==References== aberdarica Category:Least concern plants Category:Flora of Kenya Category:Flora of Uganda Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lobelia aberdarica
